sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { StyleSheet, Text, TouchableOpacity, View, useWindowDimensions, } from 'react-native'

export default function SideBarMenu() {


    const {width, height} = useWindowDimensions()
    var widthModifier = 0.6
    if(width < 1280){
        widthModifier = 0.8
    }
    else{
        widthModifier = 0.3
    }


    const styles = StyleSheet.create({
        SideBarContainer: {
            flex: 1,
            flexDirection: 'column',
            justifyContent: 'flex-start',
            alignItems: 'center',
            position: 'absolute',
            top: 0,
            left: 0,
            backgroundColor: '#566573' ,
            minWidth: widthModifier*width,
            maxWidth: widthModifier* width,
            minHeight: height,
            maxHeight: height,
            zIndex: 20,
            borderTopRightRadius: 20,
            borderBottomRightRadius: 20,
            shadowColor: '#000',
            shadowOffset: { width: 3, height: 0 },
            shadowOpacity: 0.7,
            shadowRadius: 50,  
            elevation: 5
        },
        SiderBarHeader: {
            flex: 1,
            flexDirection: 'row',
            justifyContent: 'center',
            alignItems: 'center',
            minHeight: 0.1* height,
            maxHeight: 0.1* height,
            width: widthModifier * width
        },
        MenuTitleText: {
            fontSize: 25,
            color: '#fff',
            marginRight: 'auto',

    
        },
        MenuItemsContainer: {
            flex: 1,
            flexDirection: 'column',
            justifyContent: 'flex-start',
            alignItems: 'center',
            minHeight: widthModifier* height,
            maxHeight: widthModifier* height,
            minWidth: 0.6*width,
            maxWidth: 0.6* width,
    
        },
        MenuItem: {
            flex: 1,
            flexDirection: 'column',
            justifyContent: 'center',
            alignItems: 'center',
            backgroundColor: '#2DA8D8FF',
            minWidth: widthModifier*width,
            maxWidth: widthModifier* width,
            minHeight: 0.05*height,
            maxHeight: 0.05*height,
            marginBottom: 20,
            borderRadius: 25,
            marginLeft: '1em',
            marginRight: '1em'

        },
        MenuItemText: {
            fontSize: 20,
            color: '#fff'
        },
        CloseMenuButton: {
            flex:1,
            justifyContent: 'center',
            alignItems: 'center',
            fontSize: 30,
            marginRight: 'auto',
            marginLeft: '0.5em',
            backgroundColor: '#2DA8D8FF',
            width: 40,
            maxWidth: 40,
            height: 40,
            borderRadius: 25
        },
        CloseMenuText: {
            fontSize: 20,
            color: '#fff',
            padding: 5
        }
        
    
    })

    return (
        <View style={styles.SideBarContainer}>
            <View style={styles.SiderBarHeader}>
                <TouchableOpacity style={styles.CloseMenuButton}> 
                    <Text style={styles.CloseMenuText}>X</Text>
                </TouchableOpacity>
                <Text style={styles.MenuTitleText}>Menu</Text>
            </View>
            <View style={styles.MenuItemsContainer}>
                <TouchableOpacity style={styles.MenuItem}> 
                    <Text style={styles.MenuItemText}>Join Room</Text>
                </TouchableOpacity>
                <TouchableOpacity style={styles.MenuItem}> 
                    <Text style={styles.MenuItemText}>Create Room</Text>
                </TouchableOpacity>
                <TouchableOpacity style={styles.MenuItem}> 
                    <Text style={styles.MenuItemText}>Dummy Option</Text>
                </TouchableOpacity>
            </View>
        </View>
    )
}
